constituent: chair, tree, wood, strange, large, St. Bernard, street, nail, spike, mouth
heisigStory: Instead of making a chair out of wood from a tree, this kanji has us making the whole tree into a chair, which looks most strange sitting in your living room where the sofa used to be.
koohiiStory1: To the Japanese, the first time they saw a chair, it looked like a strange use of wood! Probably why they still like to sit on the floor...
koohiiStory2: A strange kind of tree grows in the shape of a chair.
myStory: ghế. cây gỗ lạ là ghế
